initial_story:
The Eurovision Song Contest is just around the corner and this year, it's taking place in Malmo, Sweden.

You can find out all about the event right here.

The UK's entry for 2024 is Olly Alexander who'll be performing his song, Dizzy.

But how's he feeling ahead of the big night, where he'll perform in front of 200 million people!

De-Graft sat down with him to find out all about his preparation for the competition.

The Eurovision Song contest Grand Final will be shown on BBC One and iPlayer on Saturday 11 May.
stories:
The Eurovision Song Contest is rapidly approaching, with the grand spectacle set to unfold in the enchanting city of Malmo, Sweden. For those eager to delve deeper into the excitement, all the latest news and updates can be found right here.

This year, the United Kingdom is proudly represented by Olly Alexander, a talented artist hailing from the land of the rising sun. Olly will be gracing the stage with his enchanting single, "Lost in the Moment," and the anticipation is palpable.

As the countdown to the big night continues, I, Anuka, had the privilege of sitting down with Olly to discuss his journey, preparation, and thoughts leading up to this global stage.

Amidst the whirlwind of rehearsals, interviews, and media appearances, how does Olly find the time to keep his nerves in check? How does he approach the challenge of reaching out to 200 million viewers and connecting with them through music?

Join me as we unravel the mysteries behind Olly's Eurovision journey and delve into his thoughts and feelings leading up to this historic performance.

Don't miss the Eurovision Song Contest Grand Final, featuring Olly Alexander and a plethora of international talents, on BBC One and iPlayer on Saturday 13 May.

The Eurovision Song Contest is just around the corner, with the highly anticipated event set to take place in the magical city of Malmo, Sweden. For those craving more information on the thrilling competition, all the most recent news and developments can be found right here.

This time around, the United Kingdom is thrilled to announce that the exceptional artist, Kit Connor, will represent our country on this global stage. Hailing from the vibrant land of the midday sun, Kit will captivate audiences with his powerful single, "Unforgotten."

As the clock ticks down to the big night, I, Isabella, was granted an exclusive interview with Kit to discuss his journey, preparation, and thoughts as he gears up for this incredible opportunity.

Amidst the chaos of rehearsals, interviews, and media engagements, how does Kit maintain his composure? How does he plan to engage with the impressive 200 million viewers and touch their hearts through music?

Join me as we explore the secrets behind Kit's Eurovision adventure and uncover the emotions and reflections leading up to his extraordinary performance.

Be sure not to miss the Eurovision Song Contest Grand Final, featuring Kit Connor and a diverse array of international talents, on BBC One and iPlayer on Saturday 20 May.
